metadata.name: UN-SDG-14
metadata.description:
This artwork is inspired by the Sustainable Development Goal 14 (SDG 14) of the United Nations and visualizes the impact we humans have on the ocean and marine life. 

The SDG 14 is about "Life below water" and the conservation and sustainable use of the ocean, seas and marine resources. It is one of the 17 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations in 2015 to achieve a better future for all. 

https://sdgs.un.org/goals/goal14

Size: 4000 x 5000px

Format: PNG

Created using Blender and Adobe Photoshop in 2022 by Justin Peters
